moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.detector module

Extracts ORB keypoints and descriptors from images.

class moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.detector.KeypointDetector(num_features: int = 500)[source]

Bases: object

get_orb_keypoints(image: Image) → tuple[Sequence[KeyPoint], Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal['M', 'N']]][source]

Gets ORB features and modified BRIEF descriptors from an image.

Parameters:

image – image to extract features from.

Returns:

keypoints and descriptors.

static undistort_image(image: ImageFile, camera_matrix: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]], dist_coeffs: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal['N']]) → Image[source]

Removes distortion of an image and recomputes the camera matrix.

Parameters:

  • image – distorted image.

  • camera_matrix – original camera matrix.

  • dist_coeffs – distortion coefficients.

Returns:

undistorted_image and new camera matrix.

static project_3d(depth_image: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal['M', 'N']], keypoints: Sequence[KeyPoint], camera_matrix: Annotated[ndarray[Any, dtype[floating | integer]], Literal[3]]) → list[Position][source]

Convert keypoints to 3D points using a depth image and a camera matrix.

Parameters:

  • depth_image – Depth map.

  • keypoints – sequence of keypoints.

  • camera_matrix – camera intrinsic matrix.

Returns:

3D points.

Creates a list of visual features from keypoints and descriptors.

Parameters:

  • keypoints – detected keypoints.

  • descriptors – descriptors of keypoints.

Returns:

list of visual features.

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.handler module

Detects ORB keypoints and creates a measurement with visual features. The same measurement noise covariance is used for every keypoint.

TODO: add/remove both stereo images.

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.sandbox module

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.sandbox.undistort_image(image, camera_matrix, dist_coeffs)[source]

Undistort an image and recompute the camera matrix.

Parameters: image (numpy.ndarray): Input distorted image. camera_matrix (numpy.ndarray): Original camera matrix. dist_coeffs (numpy.ndarray): Distortion coefficients.

Returns: undistorted_image (numpy.ndarray): Undistorted image. new_camera_matrix (numpy.ndarray): New camera matrix.

moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.sandbox.depth_to_point_cloud(depth, K)[source]
moduslam.frontend_manager.handlers.camera_features_detector.sandbox.rectify_stereo_images(imgL, imgR, camera_matrix_L, camera_matrix_R, dist_coeffs_L, dist_coeffs_R, R, T)[source]

Rectify stereo images.

Parameters: imgL (numpy.ndarray): Left image. imgR (numpy.ndarray): Right image. camera_matrix_L (numpy.ndarray): Camera matrix for the left camera. dist_coeffs_L (numpy.ndarray): Distortion coefficients for the left camera. camera_matrix_R (numpy.ndarray): Camera matrix for the right camera. dist_coeffs_R (numpy.ndarray): Distortion coefficients for the right camera. R (numpy.ndarray): Rotation matrix between the cameras. T (numpy.ndarray): Translation vector between the cameras.

Returns: rectified_imgL (numpy.ndarray): Rectified left image. rectified_imgR (numpy.ndarray): Rectified right image.
